name: Rayman 2: The Great Escape
summary:
Rayman 2: The Great Escape is a platform video game developed by Ubi Pictures and published by Ubi Soft for the Nintendo 64, Microsoft Windows, Sega Dreamcast and Sony PlayStation. An enhanced remake titled Rayman Revolution (Rayman 2: Revolution in North America) was developed by Ubi Soft Annecy for the PlayStation 2.

An alternative remake known as Rayman 2 Forever was developed by Ubi Soft Milan for the Game Boy Color.
